content: I am a highly motivated and capable developer with a passion for learning and expanding my skill set. After beginning my coding journey with a mix of free and paid online resources, I pursued formal education at North Metropolitan TAFE, where I am currently completing diplomas in Front End Development and Back End Development.

During these two programs, I have gained valuable experience in liaising with clients, managing and delivering projects, and working collaboratively with teams. I am now seeking new opportunities to leverage my abilities and contribute to an organization while continuing to grow professionally.

Outside of coding, I am an avid photographer who enjoys spending time outdoors hiking in the summer and snowboarding in the winter. With a passion for continuous learning, I read widely and am always looking to expand my knowledge and skillset. My studies conclude in mid-2023, and I am available for part-time or similar roles until then.
